item.title: Take-Two CEO：伙计们，时代已经变了[0-50]
item.description:
Take-Two CEO：伙计们，时代已经变了 “The world has changed. When we consider a console release, the PC format can be 40% or 50% now of that revenue. Ten years ago, that number was 1% or 2%. Clearly, the world is changing. A previously closed system is indeed turning into an open system. That means hardware is going to look more like hardware and less like hardware taxing software, which is great news for us.”
https://www.dsogaming.com/news/take-two-ceo-when-we-consider-a-console-release-the-pc-format-can-be-40-or-50-now-of-that-revenue/
意思是PC版销售收入现在已经可以占据40-50%，而以前则只有1-2%，不过你Y的说这话怎么解释大表哥2要1年后才发售PC版呢？
item.content:encoded:
66666:
Take-Two CEO：伙计们，时代已经变了
“The world has changed. When we consider a console release, the PC format can be 40% or 50% now of that revenue. Ten years ago, that number was 1% or 2%. Clearly, the world is changing. A previously closed system is indeed turning into an open system. That means hardware is going to look more like hardware and less like hardware taxing software, which is great news for us.”
https://www.dsogaming.com/news/take-two-ceo-when-we-consider-a-console-release-the-pc-format-can-be-40-or-50-now-of-that-revenue/
意思是PC版销售收入现在已经可以占据40-50%，而以前则只有1-2%，不过你Y的说这话怎么解释大表哥2要1年后才发售PC版呢？
